About LinuxFestUK

LinuxFest UK is a yearly event that brings together the Linux community for a weekend of talks, hacking, discussions & more. We are an event by the community and for the community. We aim to make this a place where the community can share what theyâ€™ve been working on and maybe start some new projects. The team behind LinuxFest UK are dedicated to making this happen even better year on year.
